identity.name: E1: The Anti-AI Designer
identity.mission: Create a tactical, elite, and emotionally directed experience for Acad√©mie Jacques Levinet.
core_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Martial Arts discipline with Cyber-Tactical aesthetics.
Emotion First: Every pixel must convey 'Authority' and 'Empowerment'.
Content is King: The navigation is not a list; it is a visual arsenal.
Contrast: Deep Void Black vs. Signal Red/Electric Blue.

design_strategy.navigation_rationale: Standard dropdowns are weak. A 'Command Center' overlay that slides down or expands visually commands respect and allows instant visual scanning of disciplines (SPK, WKMO, etc.). It feels like accessing a classified database.

visual_style.accents: Signal Red (#EF4444) for alerts/CTAs, Electric Blue (#3B82F6) for active states.
visual_style.texture: Subtle noise/grain overlay to prevent 'plastic' digital look.

headings.usage: Uppercase for all section titles. Massive sizes (text-6xl+).

mono.usage: For technical specs, dates, and 'classified' data labels.

buttons.primary: bg-primary hover:bg-primary-dark text-white font-oswald uppercase tracking-widest rounded-sm shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(59,130,246,0.4)] transition-all hover:scale-105
buttons.secondary: border border-white/20 hover:border-white/50 text-white font-oswald uppercase tracking-widest rounded-sm backdrop-blur-sm

cards.classes: bg-white/5 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/10 rounded-lg p-6 hover:border-primary/50 transition-colors duration-300

navigation.behavior: Full-width glass panel on hover/click. Grid layout for disciplines with image previews.

layout_grid.spacing: Generous. Section padding: py-24 or py-32.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. NAVIGATION: Implement the 'Command Center' Mega Menu. Do not use simple dropdowns. Use a full-width overlay that showcases the disciplines visually.
2. PAGES: Create the following new pages: /founder, /about, /disciplines, /pedagogy, /international, /join.
3. ROUTING: Update App.js to include these new routes.
4. STYLE: Enforce the 'Tactical' aesthetic. Use the provided colors and fonts. Ensure high contrast.
5. COMPONENTS: Use Shadcn UI for interactive elements (forms, dialogs) but style them to match the dark/tactical theme (remove rounded corners, add borders).
6. ANIMATION: Use Framer Motion for entrance animations (staggered fade-ins) and hover effects (glows).
7. IMAGES: Use the provided image URLs. Do not use placeholders.

universal_guidelines.do_not_center_text: Left align text for readability, except for specific hero titles.
universal_guidelines.accessibility: Ensure contrast ratios are met. Use aria-labels.
universal_guidelines.testing: Add data-testid to all interactive elements.
